title: "Exploratory Analysis"
format: html

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
dat <- read.csv("Data for replication.csv")
dat_b <- read.csv("Data for replication_b.csv")
dat_c <- read.csv("Data for replication_c.csv")
dat_d <- read.csv("Data for replication_d.csv")
dat_e <- read.csv("Data for replication_e.csv")
dat_f <- read.csv("Data for replication_f.csv")
```

# Figure 1

```{r}
dat_c |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = birthyr)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1)
```

# Figure 2

```{r}
dat_b |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = birthyr, y = csize)) + 
  geom_col()
```

# Table 1

```{r}
dat |> 
  select(!county) |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = !c(county_code, cps)) |> 
  group_by(name) |> 
  filter(!is.na(value)) |> 
  summarise(mean = mean(value),
            obs = n())
```
